Title: Home
Author: Admin
Content:
This is a demo application to showcase the cloudscribe Forms and Surveys Solution.

You can login using the default credentials admin@admin.com and password admin.

After you login you will see the administration menu. You can create forms and surveys under Administration > Forms and Surveys.

You can create new pages with the plus icon on the top left of the page (after login). You will see there is a content template to create pages with forms and surveys and you can choose which form/survey to put on the page.

There are a couple of forms already created.

The Contact menu item is a page using the contact form, and the Conference Registration page is a page created using the Tech Conference Form.
